name: Accorder's Shield
oracle_text:
Equipped creature gets +0/+3 and has vigilance. (Attacking doesn't cause it to tap.)
Equip {3} ({3}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)
flavor_text: An Auriok shield is polished to a mirror finish even on the inside, enabling its bearer to watch foes ahead and behind.

name: Alpha Tyrranax
flavor_text: Hunger seized the tyrranax, and the Sylvok's vision quest ended in disaster.

name: Arrest
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature can't attack or block, and its activated abilities can't be activated.
flavor_text: Bladehold houses a rogues' gallery filled with the living "statues" of the worst enemies of the Auriok.

name: Assault Strobe
oracle_text: Target creature gains double strike until end of turn. (It deals both first-strike and regular combat damage.)
flavor_text: When breaking someone's face once just isn't enough.

name: Auriok Replica
oracle_text: {W}, Sacrifice Auriok Replica: Prevent all damage a source of your choice would deal to you this turn.
flavor_text: All the loyalty of the Auriok with only a trace of their self-righteousness.

name: Auriok Sunchaser
oracle_text: Metalcraft — As long as you control three or more artifacts, Auriok Sunchaser gets +2/+2 and has flying.
flavor_text:
"Grant me loft. Grant me light. Grant me the accuracy I need to kill all who threaten Bladehold."
—Prayer to the Whitesun

name: Blackcleave Goblin
oracle_text:
Haste
Infect (This creature deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.)
flavor_text:
"Bitten? Save time, amputate now."
—Lephar, loxodon surgeon

name: Bladed Pinions
oracle_text:
Equipped creature has flying and first strike.
Equip {2}
flavor_text: Lacking trained pterons, the Auriok had to rely on other measures to gain the upper hand in the skies.

name: Blade-Tribe Berserkers
oracle_text: Metalcraft — When Blade-Tribe Berserkers enters the battlefield, if you control three or more artifacts, Blade-Tribe Berserkers gets +3/+3 and gains haste until end of turn.

name: Bleak Coven Vampires
oracle_text: Metalcraft — When Bleak Coven Vampires enters the battlefield, if you control three or more artifacts, target player loses 4 life and you gain 4 life.
flavor_text: As the shadow of the Mephidross spread over the Tangle, the vampires' territory expanded.

name: Blight Mamba
oracle_text:
Infect (This creature deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.)
{1}{G}: Regenerate Blight Mamba.
flavor_text: Its venom drips with Phyrexia's hate.

name: Blistergrub
oracle_text:
Swampwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Swamp.)
When Blistergrub dies, each opponent loses 2 life.
flavor_text:
"The sooner you join Phyrexia, the sooner you'll forget your painful rebirth."
—Sheoldred, Whispering One

name: Blunt the Assault
oracle_text: You gain 1 life for each creature on the battlefield. Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn.
flavor_text:
"Much can be gained from the appearance of vulnerability."
—Ezuri, renegade leader

name: Bonds of Quicksilver
oracle_text:
Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step.
flavor_text: The sea's reach extends beyond its shores.

name: Carapace Forger
oracle_text: Metalcraft — Carapace Forger gets +2/+2 as long as you control three or more artifacts.
flavor_text: "Bows and whips cannot save us from these new horrors of the Mephidross."

name: Chrome Steed
oracle_text: Metalcraft — Chrome Steed gets +2/+2 as long as you control three or more artifacts.
flavor_text: According to Auriok myth, it collects scrap in order to reassemble its lost rider.

name: Contagious Nim
oracle_text: Infect (This creature deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.)
flavor_text:
"This species has grown to be my preferred receptacle for our divine message."
—Sheoldred, Whispering One

name: Copperhorn Scout
oracle_text: Whenever Copperhorn Scout attacks, untap each other creature you control.
flavor_text: Fangren spur may sound louder, but Viridian resurgents claim that the horn of the vorrac creates a truer, more inspiring note.

name: Copper Myr
oracle_text: {T}: Add {G}.
flavor_text: The myr are like verdigris: an ever-present patina on the surface of a metal world.

name: Corpse Cur
oracle_text:
Infect (This creature deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.)
When Corpse Cur enters the battlefield, you may return target creature card with infect from your graveyard to your hand.

name: Cystbearer
oracle_text: Infect (This creature deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.)
flavor_text: Phyrexia strives to simulate natural life, but it can't resist improving on the design.

name: Disperse
oracle_text: Return target nonland permanent to its owner's hand.
flavor_text: Most casualties of the power struggle between vedalken and Neurok didn't die on the field of battle; they merely disappeared.

name: Dross Hopper
oracle_text: Sacrifice a creature: Dross Hopper gains flying until end of turn.
flavor_text: Bred in the vicious Mephidross, dross hoppers learned to eat quickly and escape faster.

name: Echo Circlet
oracle_text:
Equipped creature can block an additional creature each combat.
Equip {1}
flavor_text: After the vanishing of the elder generations, the Anvil Tribe developed creative solutions to their personnel shortages.

name: Ezuri's Archers
oracle_text:
Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)
Whenever Ezuri's Archers blocks a creature with flying, Ezuri's Archers gets +3/+0 until end of turn.

name: Ferrovore
oracle_text: {R}, Sacrifice an artifact: Ferrovore gets +3/+0 until end of turn.
flavor_text: The Vulshok use its digestion to break down the most obstinate artifacts, from darksteel myr to seastrider plates.

name: Flameborn Hellion
oracle_text:
Haste
Flameborn Hellion attacks each combat if able.
flavor_text:
"The most reliable omen of a future hellion attack is a past hellion attack."
—Spear-Tribe teaching

name: Flight Spellbomb
oracle_text:
{T}, Sacrifice Flight Spellbomb: Target creature gains flying until end of turn.
When Flight Spellbomb is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, you may pay {U}. If you do, draw a card.

name: Fulgent Distraction
oracle_text: Choose two target creatures. Tap those creatures, then unattach all Equipment from them.
flavor_text:
"Channeling the white-hot power of all five suns creates a pretty good diversion."
—Yavash of the Accorders

name: Fume Spitter
oracle_text: Sacrifice Fume Spitter: Put a -1/-1 counter on target creature.
flavor_text:
"Our archers made sport of it as it fumbled its way up the slag ridge. As it collapsed we thought ourselves safe, but the foul thing carried more than necrogen."
—Adaran, Tangle hunter

name: Galvanic Blast
oracle_text:
Galvanic Blast deals 2 damage to any target.
Metalcraft — Galvanic Blast deals 4 damage instead if you control three or more artifacts.
flavor_text: Mirrodin has little weather, but it certainly has lightning.

name: Ghalma's Warden
oracle_text: Metalcraft — Ghalma's Warden gets +2/+2 as long as you control three or more artifacts.
flavor_text: A special unit guards the loxodon artificer known as Ghalma the Shaper. They are armed and armored in her finest works of silver and steel.

name: Glimmerpost
oracle_text:
When Glimmerpost enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life for each Locus on the battlefield.
{T}: Add {C}.
flavor_text: What once spied upon Mirrodin from above now waits below for another to assume control.

name: Glint Hawk
oracle_text:
Flying
When Glint Hawk enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you return an artifact you control to its owner's hand.
flavor_text: Its eyes burned nearly blind by the Whitesun, it hunts by metallic gleam.

name: Glint Hawk Idol
oracle_text:
Whenever another artifact enters the battlefield under your control, you may have Glint Hawk Idol become a 2/2 Bird artifact creature with flying until end of turn.
{W}: Glint Hawk Idol becomes a 2/2 Bird artifact creature with flying until end of turn.

name: Goblin Gaveleer
oracle_text:
Trample
Goblin Gaveleer gets +2/+0 for each Equipment attached to it.
flavor_text:
"When everything looks like a nail, you really need to get yourself a hammer."
—Krol, goblin furnace-priest

name: Golden Urn
oracle_text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, you may put a charge counter on Golden Urn.
{T}, Sacrifice Golden Urn: You gain life equal to the number of charge counters on Golden Urn.

name: Gold Myr
oracle_text: {T}: Add {W}.
flavor_text: The myr are like razorgrass: numberless metal figures, reflecting each other's light.

name: Golem Foundry
oracle_text:
Whenever you cast an artifact spell, you may put a charge counter on Golem Foundry.
Remove three charge counters from Golem Foundry: Create a 3/3 colorless Golem artifact creature token.

name: Grasp of Darkness
oracle_text: Target creature gets -4/-4 until end of turn.
flavor_text: On a world with five suns, night is compelled to become an aggressive force.

name: Horizon Spellbomb
oracle_text:
{2}, {T}, Sacrifice Horizon Spellbomb: Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
When Horizon Spellbomb is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, you may pay {G}. If you do, draw a card.

name: Ichorclaw Myr
oracle_text:
Infect (This creature deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.)
Whenever Ichorclaw Myr becomes blocked, it gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

name: Instill Infection
oracle_text:
Put a -1/-1 counter on target creature.
Draw a card.
flavor_text:
"The results of our ninth inoculation were the same. The specimen was, of course, euthanized before the contagion could spread."
—Vedalken research notes

name: Iron Myr
oracle_text: {T}: Add {R}.
flavor_text: The myr are like rusted metal: gleaming purpose hidden by a thin disguise of debris.

name: Kemba's Skyguard
oracle_text:
Flying
When Kemba's Skyguard enters the battlefield, you gain 2 life.
flavor_text:
"We're now to dispense aid to any Mirran we see battling anything . . . 'strange.' Regent's orders."
—Ranya, skyhunter captain

name: Kuldotha Rebirth
oracle_text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice an artifact.
Create three 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens.
flavor_text: All goblin rituals serve a dual purpose as fertility rites, even the destructive ones. Especially the destructive ones.

name: Leaden Myr
oracle_text: {T}: Add {B}.
flavor_text: The myr are like necrogen: a transformative force unconcerned with the changes they wreak.

name: Loxodon Wayfarer
flavor_text: The Mirran elders vanished with Memnarch, leaving behind a generation of wayward orphans.

name: Lumengrid Drake
oracle_text:
Flying
Metalcraft — When Lumengrid Drake enters the battlefield, if you control three or more artifacts, return target creature to its owner's hand.
flavor_text: Properly outfitted, drakes made perfect sentries for vedalken strongholds.

name: Melt Terrain
oracle_text: Destroy target land. Melt Terrain deals 2 damage to that land's controller.
flavor_text: Just as the most finely wrought metal can warp and rust, so too does Mirrodin buckle under pressures from without and within.

name: Molder Beast
oracle_text:
Trample
Whenever an artifact is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, Molder Beast gets +2/+0 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"A trail of scrap metal can lead it into an ambush. But take care not to overfeed it."
—Adaran, Tangle hunter

name: Moriok Reaver
flavor_text:
"The Moriok are fools. They try so hard to gain my favor. All I want is for them to die quickly, to join the ranks of the nim."
—Geth, Lord of the Vault

name: Moriok Replica
oracle_text: {1}{B}, Sacrifice Moriok Replica: You draw two cards and you lose 2 life.
flavor_text: All the secrets of the Moriok with only a trace of their corruption.

name: Necrogen Censer
oracle_text:
Necrogen Censer enters the battlefield with two charge counters on it.
{T}, Remove a charge counter from Necrogen Censer: Target player loses 2 life.
flavor_text: Moriok necromancers actively spread necrogen, encouraging the transformation from Mirran to nim.

name: Neurok Invisimancer
oracle_text:
Neurok Invisimancer can't be blocked.
When Neurok Invisimancer enters the battlefield, target creature can't be blocked this turn.
flavor_text: "They won't see your shadow or hear your breath, but they will feel your blade."

name: Neurok Replica
oracle_text: {1}{U}, Sacrifice Neurok Replica: Return target creature to its owner's hand.
flavor_text: All the curiosity of the Neurok with only a trace of their duplicity.

name: Nihil Spellbomb
oracle_text:
{T}, Sacrifice Nihil Spellbomb: Exile target player's graveyard.
When Nihil Spellbomb is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, you may pay {B}. If you do, draw a card.

name: Origin Spellbomb
oracle_text:
{1}, {T}, Sacrifice Origin Spellbomb: Create a 1/1 colorless Myr artifact creature token.
When Origin Spellbomb is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, you may pay {W}. If you do, draw a card.

name: Oxidda Daredevil
oracle_text: Sacrifice an artifact: Oxidda Daredevil gains haste until end of turn.
flavor_text: His goggles spattered with grime and his mouth full of bugs, he tossed the engines another priceless relic.

name: Panic Spellbomb
oracle_text:
{T}, Sacrifice Panic Spellbomb: Target creature can't block this turn.
When Panic Spellbomb is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, you may pay {R}. If you do, draw a card.

name: Perilous Myr
oracle_text: When Perilous Myr dies, it deals 2 damage to any target.
flavor_text: To Mirrodin, an explosive. To Phyrexia, a missionary.

name: Plague Stinger
oracle_text:
Flying
Infect (This creature deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.)
flavor_text: It leaves its victims one sting closer to phyresis.

name: Plated Seastrider
flavor_text: The Neurok buried entangling cables just under the Quicksilver Sea. One seastrider harvest can provide an army's worth of armor and shields.

name: Psychic Miasma
oracle_text: Target player discards a card. If a land card is discarded this way, return Psychic Miasma to its owner's hand.
flavor_text:
"A mind may be steeled against madness, but all battlements fall in time."
—Jin-Gitaxias, Core Augur

name: Razorfield Thresher
flavor_text: DANGER! Keep appendages clear of front of machine. And rear of machine. And side of machine. And top of machine.

name: Relic Putrescence
oracle_text:
Enchant artifact
Whenever enchanted artifact becomes tapped, its controller gets a poison counter.
flavor_text:
"Until we shed the curse of sentience, we must endure its grotesque handiwork."
—Vorinclex, Voice of Hunger

name: Revoke Existence
oracle_text: Exile target artifact or enchantment.
flavor_text:
"No half measures, no regrets. We'll tell no stories of this day. It will be as if it never existed at all."
—Ganedor, loxodon mystic

name: Saberclaw Golem
oracle_text: {R}: Saberclaw Golem gains first strike until end of turn.
flavor_text: The warriors of the Blade Tribe charged the golem, twenty strong. They returned numbering ten . . . and a half.

name: Salvage Scout
oracle_text: {W}, Sacrifice Salvage Scout: Return target artifact card from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor_text: "I'm not saying it's dangerous work. I'm just saying don't sign up if you have plans for your seventieth birthday."

name: Scoria Elemental
flavor_text: A single molten cord links it to the subterranean furnaces, drawing heat and metal from beneath Kuldotha. Until that bond is cut, it carves a swath of raw destruction.

name: Scrapdiver Serpent
oracle_text: Scrapdiver Serpent can't be blocked as long as defending player controls an artifact.
flavor_text: Smart artificers clean up after themselves.

name: Screeching Silcaw
oracle_text:
Flying
Metalcraft — Whenever Screeching Silcaw deals combat damage to a player, if you control three or more artifacts, that player mills four cards.
flavor_text: It's adaptively deaf to its own cries.

name: Seize the Initiative
oracle_text: Target creature gets +1/+1 and gains first strike until end of turn.
flavor_text: The time between spotting a leonin shikari and feeling its claws is just time enough to draw your last breath.

name: Shatter
oracle_text: Destroy target artifact.
flavor_text:
"I am an artist, a builder, a creator . . . I create the biggest explosions around."
—Krol, goblin furnace-priest

name: Silver Myr
oracle_text: {T}: Add {U}.
flavor_text: The myr are like quicksilver: malleable in function and adaptable in form.

name: Sky-Eel School
oracle_text:
Flying
When Sky-Eel School enters the battlefield, draw a card, then discard a card.
flavor_text: They swim on tides few can see, away from a threat few yet understand.

name: Snapsail Glider
oracle_text: Metalcraft — Snapsail Glider has flying as long as you control three or more artifacts.
flavor_text: Built from a reconfigured thresher, it charges with light reflected off the golden plain, ready to take to the air in case of danger.

name: Soliton
oracle_text: {U}: Untap Soliton.
flavor_text: The gemini engines had lost connection with each other and wandered apart, developing an independent awareness of their surroundings.

name: Soul Parry
oracle_text: Prevent all damage one or two target creatures would deal this turn.
flavor_text:
"I was called to this world of steel, and it will be my steel that answers."
—Elspeth Tirel

name: Steady Progress
oracle_text:
Proliferate. (Choose any number of permanents and/or players, then give each another counter of each kind already there.)
Draw a card.
flavor_text: "More of that strange oil . . . It's probably nothing."

name: Stoic Rebuttal
oracle_text:
Metalcraft — This spell costs {1} less to cast if you control three or more artifacts.
Counter target spell.
flavor_text: Obsessed with the pursuit of knowledge above all else, vedalken can appear to be cold and emotionless.

name: Strider Harness
oracle_text:
Equipped creature gets +1/+1 and has haste.
Equip {1} ({1}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)
flavor_text: Each journey begins with a single step—and sometimes ends with that single step as well.

name: Sunspear Shikari
oracle_text: As long as Sunspear Shikari is equipped, it has first strike and lifelink.
flavor_text: Left without their leader Raksha, the leonin split into two prides: one side supported the regent kha, while the other rebelled in fury.

name: Sylvok Lifestaff
flavor_text: The druid's lifestaff connects her to generations of bygone Sylvok.

name: Sylvok Replica
oracle_text: {G}, Sacrifice Sylvok Replica: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.
flavor_text: All the zeal of the Sylvok with only a trace of their conservancy.

name: Tainted Strike
oracle_text: Target creature gets +1/+0 and gains infect until end of turn. (It deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.)
flavor_text:
"Welcome to perfection."
—Sheoldred, Whispering One

name: Tel-Jilad Defiance
oracle_text:
Target creature gains protection from artifacts until end of turn.
Draw a card.
flavor_text: The Viridian elves had purged their culture of the trolls' traitorous influence. In times of strife, however, the ancestral memories returned.

name: Tel-Jilad Fallen
oracle_text:
Protection from artifacts
Infect (This creature deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.)
flavor_text: "No longer am I shackled to antiquity. My new masters will etch a glorious future."

name: Tumble Magnet
oracle_text:
Tumble Magnet enters the battlefield with three charge counters on it.
{T}, Remove a charge counter from Tumble Magnet: Tap target artifact or creature.
flavor_text: Magnetic devices that keep massive golems and structures standing can also be used for the opposite purpose.

name: Turn Aside
oracle_text: Counter target spell that targets a permanent you control.
flavor_text: "It's not my job to ask our leaders about their experiments at the Knowledge Pool. It's my job to make sure they can continue performing them."

name: Turn to Slag
oracle_text: Turn to Slag deals 5 damage to target creature. Destroy all Equipment attached to that creature.
flavor_text:
"If it wasn't a blackened, stinking, melted abomination before, it certainly is now."
—Koth of the Hammer

name: Untamed Might
oracle_text: Target creature gets +X/+X until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"Beasts kill for their very survival. If you would have their strength, you must know their desperation."
—Konnos, Sylvok sage

name: Vault Skyward
oracle_text: Target creature gains flying until end of turn. Untap it.
flavor_text:
"The edges of the Quicksilver Sea run dark with the spread of the Mephidross. Two more aerial passes before I can be sure what I'm seeing . . ."
—Lafarius, Neurok sky agent

name: Vector Asp
oracle_text: {B}: Vector Asp gains infect until end of turn. (It deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.)
flavor_text: Phyrexia's machines take inspiration from nature. Twisted, disturbing inspiration.

name: Vedalken Certarch
oracle_text: Metalcraft — {T}: Tap target artifact, creature, or land. Activate only if you control three or more artifacts.
flavor_text: "An appropriately detailed model is indistinguishable from reality, and much easier to control."

name: Vulshok Heartstoker
oracle_text: When Vulshok Heartstoker enters the battlefield, target creature gets +2/+0 until end of turn.
flavor_text: He fashions stirring words with as much passion as a smith fashioning a warhammer.

name: Vulshok Replica
oracle_text: {1}{R}, Sacrifice Vulshok Replica: It deals 3 damage to target player or planeswalker.
flavor_text: All the fury of the Vulshok with only a trace of their recklessness.

name: Wall of Tanglecord
oracle_text:
Defender
{G}: Wall of Tanglecord gains reach until end of turn. (It can block creatures with flying.)
flavor_text: Rootlike fibers travel far from Mirrodin's metallic forests, emerging from the crust to drink in the mana-infused sunlight.

name: Whitesun's Passage
oracle_text: You gain 5 life.
flavor_text: All over the Razor Fields, Whitesun is celebrated. Even the followers of the rebel Juryan, far from the Cave of Light, bow their heads in reverence.

name: Wing Puncture
oracle_text: Target creature you control deals damage equal to its power to target creature with flying.
flavor_text:
"If I were the air, I wouldn't taunt the ground. It has the weight advantage."
—Konnos, Sylvok sage

name: Withstand Death
oracle_text: Target creature gains indestructible until end of turn. (Damage and effects that say "destroy" don't destroy it. If its toughness is 0 or less, it's still put into its owner's graveyard.)
flavor_text: On Mirrodin, every conflict ends in either death or darksteel.
